title: Curving the Future: Greening the Pipeline’s Sustainable Legacy
author: Natalie
excerpt: At Urblo, we’re pushing the boundaries of sustainable design with bold, innovative landscapes. Our latest project, Greening the Pipeline Education Node in Truganina, reimagines urban spaces through fluidity, resilience, and eco-conscious craftsmanship. Here’s how we turned 76 linear metres of curves into a carbon-neutral masterpiece.

title: Debunking the Cost Myth by Urblo Bluestone Blocks
author: Natalie
excerpt: At Urblo, we’re rewriting the rules of landscape design—proving that bluestone isn’t just a premium material but a cost-efficient, time-saving powerhouse. Our collaboration at Bundha Sports Center showcases how natural stone can outperform concrete in every aspect. Let’s dive into the details.

title: Modular Mastery: How PrimeBlock Core Transformed Aitken College
author: Natalie
excerpt: At Urblo, we prove that foundational design need not be basic. For Aitken College’s dynamic new junior school, PrimeBlock Core – our simplest standardized product – became the hero. Through strategic layering, varied lengths, and seamless straight-curve combinations, these modular units created:

title: Stone Transformed: 8 Ways to Redefine Bluestone’s Look & Feel
author: Natalie
excerpt: At Urblo, we believe stone isn’t just a material – it’s a canvas. In our new “Material Mastery” series, we’re diving deep into how surface treatments unlock endless design possibilities. First up: Bluestone, reimagined through 8 finishes.
